songs.title: Both Ways
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]:
Want smoke, ayy
If he be crossing my street‚ better look both ways

[Verse 1]
Got my cash‚ Yeah(Got my Cash)
Tell them fuck niggas catch up
To bad they can't catch us
He alone‚ He need back up

[SNIPPET]
